messages.msgSnippet: mmm, so do I, so what we now know is that I am an idiot LOL. Ok, maybe it is trying to use Kanji from the Yahoo email interface. I think that is a no no. Rich
messages.messageBody:
mmm, so do I, so what we now know is that I am an idiot LOL.

Ok, maybe it is trying to use Kanji from the Yahoo email interface. I
think that is a no no.

Rich

Richard Turner
Nihontô Message Board
<http://members5.boardhost.com/Nihon-To/>
- /for the discussion and sharing of all things Nihontô/
